class.name: GraphPlotting
class.documentation: This action routine (and C++object) controls the plotting of curves, bar charts and area charts.

parameter.name: legend
parameter.documentation: Turn on/off the legend for this graph (this parameter is new to Magics++)

parameter.name: legend_user_text
parameter.documentation: User-defined text for the legend of this graph

parameter.name: graph_type
parameter.documentation: Defines the type of curve required
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter graph_type sent to new Magics[Graph].

parameter.name: graph_shade
parameter.documentation: Turn the shading on

class.name: Curve
class.documentation: Here comes the documentation of the Curve object

parameter.name: graph_line
parameter.documentation: Plot the curve line

parameter.name: graph_line_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of the curve

parameter.name: graph_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the curve

parameter.name: graph_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the curve

parameter.name: graph_symbol
parameter.documentation: If symbols are to be drawn on the curves

parameter.documentation: Height of symbol

parameter.name: graph_symbol_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of graph symbol

parameter.name: graph_y_suppress_above

parameter.documentation: The colour of the Flags!

parameter.documentation: Physical length of wind flag shaft

parameter.name: graph_arrow_colour
parameter.documentation: The colour of the arrows

parameter.documentation: The width of a bar in a bar chart

parameter.documentation: the bar will be centered on the value, or left, right justify : useful for plotting any accumulated fields

parameter.name: graph_bar_colour
parameter.documentation: The colour of the interiors of bars

parameter.name: graph_bar_clipping
parameter.documentation: whether or not to clip the bar if they go outside the view area.
